changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE public.affiliate_mercantile ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS id_affiliate INTEGER;

changeSet.author: andual
changeSet.sql: UPDATE public.affiliate_mercantile am SET id_affiliate = a.id_affiliate FROM public.affiliate a WHERE am.id_affiliate IS NULL AND a.filed_number = am.filed_number;

changeSet.author: andual
changeSet.sql:
-- Backup orphan child rows CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.affiliate_activity_economic_orphan_backup AS SELECT e.* FROM public.affiliate_activity_economic e JOIN public.affiliate_mercantile m ON m.id = e.id_affiliate_mercantile LEFT JOIN public.affiliate a ON a.id_affiliate = m.id_affiliate WHERE a.id_affiliate IS NULL OR m.id_affiliate IS NULL;
-- Delete orphan child rows DELETE FROM public.affiliate_activity_economic e USING public.affiliate_mercantile m LEFT JOIN public.affiliate a ON a.id_affiliate = m.id_affiliate WHERE e.id_affiliate_mercantile = m.id AND (a.id_affiliate IS NULL OR m.id_affiliate IS NULL);

changeSet.author: andual

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM public.affiliate_mercantile m LEFT JOIN public.affiliate a ON a.id_affiliate = m.id_affiliate WHERE a.id_affiliate IS NULL OR m.id_affiliate IS NULL ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM public.affiliate_mercantile GROUP BY filed_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

changeSet.sql: -- Delete FK violations (re-run under CASCADE) DELETE FROM public.affiliate_mercantile m USING ( SELECT m.ctid FROM public.affiliate_mercantile m LEFT JOIN public.affiliate a ON a.id_affiliate = m.id_affiliate WHERE a.id_affiliate IS NULL OR m.id_affiliate IS NULL ) z WHERE m.ctid = z.ctid;
